chart.title: Poultry production
chart.subtitle: Expressed in tonnes.
chart.note: This refers to total meat production, from both commercial and farm slaughter. Data are given in terms of dressed carcass weight, excluding offal and slaughter fats.
chart.citation: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (2025)
